AsyncFireAllRulesRuleBaseUpdateListener  
BaseClassFieldExtractor This is the supertype for the ASM generated classes for accessing a field.

ClassFieldExtractor This provides access to fields, and what their numerical index/object type is.
ClassFieldExtractorCache As class field Extractors have some cost to generate (inspecting the class, and generating classes via ASM) it makes sense to cache them.
ClassFieldExtractorFactory This generates subclasses of BaseClassFieldExtractor to provide field extractors.
